TopicTitle: Do you ever PM yourself accidentally?

Articles.Content:
Wow, this is annoying. Whenever I try to PM someone I (more often than not) forget to change the user I'm sending it to to someone other than me.

That was a bit of a tongue-twister. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-21T22:05:07Z" title="02/21/2015 10:05  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 21, 2015</time> by Starwhip**
You can do that? I never knew! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

The only reason it happens to me is that I normally don't bother looking for one of their posts and just make a new PM. Then I forget. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

It happens more when I hit "reply" in a PM and it generates a new one.
Oh yeah. I recently PM'ed myself ~3 times in a row. ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)
I barely use PMs, ever. So, I don't think I have..
Only when I agree with what I said.

Never, I didn't even knew it was possible.

\*go and try to do so\*

EDIT: It work!

Hmm, so that works, let's kick it up to a new level:

![SelfPM.png](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/61004449/KSP/Misc/SelfPM.png)

> 
> Hmm, so that works, let's kick it up to a new level:
> [https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/61004449/KSP/Misc/SelfPM.png](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/61004449/KSP/Misc/SelfPM.png)

Did you actually do that?

Interesting.

Does it work with reputation too?
Nein. Look at another poster's rep icon. Now look at yours. IT'S NOT THERE. The reason? If it was, people would abuse it. Badly.
I don't think I've ever sent a PM on this forum that wasn't a reply to someone else PMing me ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Except he's a mod, and mods have special privileges.

I bet that Kasper could do it.
I assure you that moderators cannot rep themselves. I believe administrators can edit rep directly, but it's very, very rare (SQUAD account, Jeb/Bill/Bob/Valentina, GIC).
Even though I rarely PM, I PMed myself when I tried to figure out how to create a thread on my second day of KSP Foruming. I responded to my test PM later.
